channel.title: Typing on Bluepie's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Typing on Bluepie's Journal

item.title: Learning to type faster
item.description: Hi there, I learnt the offical way to type and its way faster than my way of typing. Reality is way different - Update on current things. I know i’ve been busy, but i can make up to it. Status update First: The last few weeks,infact the last month is very odd and had a busy schedule. I could’nt concentrate on few other projects, Office work took over my life, to be exact!
